title: #301: Kill On Sight Prison Justice with Shaun Attwood
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome former International Ecstasy Drug Lord, Author and Youtube Superstar Shaun Attwood to discuss "kill on site" prison justice and the murder of Jeffery Epstein. Thank you so much for listening and all of your support.

Please check out
Shaun's youtube: https://www.youtube.com/shaunattwood
Shaun Attwood's books: https://shaunattwood.com/books/

Please check out all of our platforms:

Youtube.com/SamTripoli
